data.text: @SenTedBuddNC @SenateGOP Office of Personnel Management issued a final rule to STRIP civil service protections from 50,000 Fed employees, enabling the Trump Admin to replace nonpartisan civil servants hired for their skills with LOYALISTS. 94% of 40,000 public comments opposed the change. 5% support it https://t.co/1SQMDGdMR6
